version_description:
• Search your custom rules and perform actions on the search results
• User interface, accessibility, and performance improvements

If you find Roadblock useful then please consider rating it in the App Store. You can rate Roadblock via "Rate Roadblock" in "More > About".

Roadblock 1.5 adds iCloud Sync and improves the user experience.

• iCloud Sync: keeps profiles and settings up-to-date across all your devices (iOS 10 and macOS 10.12)
• iCloud Sync preference
• Built-in rules updates and improvements
• Bug fixes and general improvements

If you find Roadblock useful then please consider rating it in the App Store. You can rate Roadblock via "Rate Roadblock" in "More > About".
